mapper.sql: id, site_name, product_loaded_code, single_price_code, num_code, add_cart_code, added_code, cart_loaded_code, numed_code, gmt_create, gmt_modified, operator
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO auto_order_select_product ( site_name, product_loaded_code, single_price_code, num_code, add_cart_code, added_code, cart_loaded_code, numed_code, gmt_create, gmt_modified, operator ) VALUES ( #{siteName}, #{productLoadedCode}, #{singlePriceCode}, #{numCode}, #{addCartCode}, #{addedCode}, #{cartLoadedCode}, #{numedCode}, #{gmtCreate}, #{gmtModified}, #{operator})
mapper.update: update auto_order_select_product set site_name=#{siteName}, product_loaded_code=#{productLoadedCode}, single_price_code=#{singlePriceCode}, num_code=#{numCode}, add_cart_code=#{addCartCode}, added_code=#{addedCode}, cart_loaded_code=#{cartLoadedCode}, numed_code=#{numedCode}, gmt_create=#{gmtCreate}, gmt_modified=#{gmtModified}, operator=#{operator} where id=#{id}

update auto_order_select_product
site_name=#{siteName},
product_loaded_code=#{productLoadedCode},
single_price_code=#{singlePriceCode},
num_code=#{numCode},
add_cart_code=#{addCartCode},
added_code=#{addedCode},
cart_loaded_code=#{cartLoadedCode},
numed_code=#{numedCode},
gmt_create=#{gmtCreate},
gmt_modified=#{gmtModified},
operator=#{operator}
where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select count(1) from auto_order_select_product where id=#{id}
select from auto_order_select_product where site_name=#{siteName} limit 1
